title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - September 28, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - September 28, 2021
description:
Adam and Mark connect to discuss the news surrounding vaccine mandates specifically looking at New York's recent moves and they review comments made by NBA player Jonathan Isaac and give their reactions.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.

Please Support Our Sponsors:
BetterHelp.com/ReasonableDoubt
